abilities.name: Mes
abilities.description: Law can extract a person's heart from their body without killing them. The heart is encased in a cube-like form, and any damage to the heart affects the original person.
abilities.limitations: Must be performed within Law's Room

abilities.name: Room
abilities.description: Creates a spherical space where Law can manipulate anything within it like a surgeon, including cutting, switching, and rearranging objects and people.
abilities.limitations: Requires energy to maintain, larger Rooms drain more stamina

keyMoments.title: Mes Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Law uses Mes to extract Smoker's heart during their battle.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Law's ability to remove hearts, one of the Ope Ope no Mi's most fearsome powers.

reveals.information: The Ope Ope no Mi can extract hearts without killing the victim

abilities.name: Smoke Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke.
abilities.limitations: Vulnerable to Sea Stone weapons and Haki

keyMoments.title: Smoker Uses Smoke Powers Against Law
keyMoments.description: Smoker employs his smoke abilities in combat against Law.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's continued reliance on his Logia powers post-timeskip.
